Class JoddMailDefaults

    • Method Detail

      • isMailMimeEncodefilename

        public boolean isMailMimeEncodefilename()
        Returns:
        true if mailMimeEncodefilename is true.
        See Also:
        setMailMimeEncodefilename(boolean)

      • setMailMimeEncodefilename

        public void setMailMimeEncodefilename(boolean mailMimeEncodefilename)
        Sets mailMimeEncodefilename variable.
        Parameters:
        mailMimeEncodefilename - If set to true, the setFileName method uses the MimeUtility.encodeText(String) to encode any non-ASCII characters in the filename. Note that this encoding violates the MIME specification, but is useful for interoperating with some mail clients that use this convention. The default is true.

      • isMailMimeDecodefilename

        public boolean isMailMimeDecodefilename()
        See Also:
        setMailMimeDecodefilename(boolean)

      • setMailMimeDecodefilename

        public void setMailMimeDecodefilename(boolean mailMimeDecodefilename)
        Sets mailMimeDecodefilename variable.
        Parameters:
        mailMimeDecodefilename - If set to true, the getFileName method uses the MimeUtility.decodeText(String) to decode any non-ASCII characters in the filename. Note that this decoding violates the MIME specification, but is useful for interoperating with some mail clients that use this convention. The default is true.
